title: Location! Location! Location! Beautiful Townhome...
posting_body: Very best combo of location and lifestyle.
Situated in Dallas, Texas, offers newly renovated apartment homes.
Take a refreshing dip or just lounge around our stunning resort-style pool.
Get a work-out at our 24 hr.
Fitness Center or entertaining your guests in our BBQ Area.
Your furry friends will run to their hearts content in our dog park and pampered at our Doggie Spa.
Instant connectivity to Interstate 635 and Highway 75, and offers residents the ability to enjoy all that Dallas has to offer with all of its, shopping, restaurants and entertainment.
Please Call Desiree With DASH Apartment Locaters
